00019 template <class T>
00020 CArrayOS2D<T>::CArrayOS2D() : CArray2D<T>()
00021 {
00022         SetSubIndexing(0); // subindexing defaults to zero
00023         SetOrigo(CPoint2D<double>(0,0));
00024 }
00025 
00026 template <class T>
00027 CArrayOS2D<T>::CArrayOS2D(UINT32 x, UINT32 y, unsigned int SubIndexing)
00028 {
00029         m_pData=NULL;
00030         if (Alloc(x,y,SubIndexing)==false)
00031         {
00032                 ostringstream ost;
00033                 ost << "CArrayOS2D<T>::CArrayOS2D() Object construction failed" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00034                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00035         }
00036 }
00037 
00038 template <class T>
00039 CArrayOS2D<T>::CArrayOS2D(const CArrayOS2D<T>& M)
00040 {
00041         // copy constructor
00042         m_pData=NULL;
00043         *this=M;
00044 }
00045 
00046 template <class T>
00047 void CArrayOS2D<T>::Empty()
00048 {
00049         CArray2D<T>::Empty(); // call base class' Empty()
00050         SetSubIndexing(0); // subindexing defaults to zero
00051         SetOrigo(CPoint2D<double>(0,0));
00052 }
00053 
00054 template <class T>
00055 bool CArrayOS2D<T>::Alloc(UINT32 x, UINT32 y, unsigned int SubIndexing)
00056 {
00057         //SubIndexing++; // internal stored value is added one to avoid some calculation later on
00058         if (CArray2D<T>::Alloc(x*(SubIndexing+1),y*(SubIndexing+1))==false) // call base class' Alloc()
00059                 return false;
00060         bool ReturnValue=SetSubIndexing(SubIndexing);
00061         SetOrigo(CPoint2D<double>(0,0));
00062         return ReturnValue;
00063 }
00064 
00065 template <class T>
00066 double CArrayOS2D<T>::GetSubStep() const
00067 {
00068         return m_SubStep;
00069 }
00070 
00071 template <class T>
00072 bool CArrayOS2D<T>::Load(const char* pPathAndFileName)
00073 {
00074         ifstream s(pPathAndFileName);
00075         if (s.is_open()==true)
00076         {
00077                 Empty(); // delete all contents
00078                 string str;
00079                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00080                 s >> str;
00081                 if (str!=string("CArrayOS2D"))
00082                 {
00083                         ostringstream ost;
00084                         ost << "CArrayOS2D<T>::Load() Did not find the token 'CArray2D' in beginning of file" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00085                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00086                         s.close();
00087                         return false;
00088                 }
00089                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00090                 s >> str;
00091                 if (str!=string("Dimensions:"))
00092                 {
00093                         ostringstream ost;
00094                         ost << "CArray2D<T>::Load() Did not find the token 'Dimensions:'" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00095                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00096                         s.close();
00097                         return false;
00098                 }
00099                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00100                 s >> m_Width;
00101                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00102                 s >> m_Height;
00103                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00104                 s >> str;
00105                 if (str!=string("Origo:"))
00106                 {
00107                         ostringstream ost;
00108                         ost << "CArray2D<T>::Load() Did not find the token 'Origo:'" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00109                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00110                         s.close();
00111                         return false;
00112                 }
00113                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00114                 CPoint2D<double> Origo;
00115                 Origo << s;
00116                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00117                 s >> str;
00118                 if (str!=string("SubIndexing:"))
00119                 {
00120                         ostringstream ost;
00121                         ost << "CArray2D<T>::Load() Did not find the token 'SubIndexing:'" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00122                         CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00123                         s.close();
00124                         return false;
00125                 }
00126                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00127                 s >> m_SubIndexing;
00128                 Alloc(m_Width,m_Height,m_SubIndexing);
00129                 SetOrigo(Origo);
00130                 for(double y=GetMinY(); y<GetMaxY(); y+=GetSubStep())
00131                 {
00132                         for(double x=GetMinX(); x<GetMaxX(); x+=GetSubStep())
00133                         {
00134                                 SkipSpaceAndComments(s);
00135                                 operator[](x)[y] << s;
00136                         }
00137                 }
00138                 m_Origin=DISC;
00139                 return true;
00140         }
00141         else
00142         {
00143                 ostringstream ost;
00144                 ost << "CArrayOS2D<T>::Load() Failed opening file: " << pPathAndFileName << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00145                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00146                 return false;
00147         }
00148 }
00149 
00150 template <class T>
00151 bool CArrayOS2D<T>::Save(const char* pPathAndFileName)
00152 {
00153         ofstream s(pPathAndFileName);
00154         if (s.is_open()==true)
00155         {
00156                 s << "# Data from a CArrayOS2D object in IPL98" << endl;
00157                 //s << "CArrayOS2D" << endl;
00158                 s << "Dimensions: " << GetWidth() << " " << GetHeight() << endl;
00159                 s << "Origo: " << GetOrigo() << endl;
00160                 s << "SubIndexing: " << GetSubIndexing() << endl;
00161                 for(double y=GetMinY(); y<GetMaxY(); y+=GetSubStep())
00162                 {
00163                         for(double x=GetMinX(); x<GetMaxX(); x+=GetSubStep())
00164                                 s << operator[](x)[y] << " ";
00165                         s << "\n";
00166                 }
00167                 return true;
00168         }
00169         else
00170         {
00171                 ostringstream ost;
00172                 ost << "CArrayOS2D<T>::Save() Failed opening file: " << pPathAndFileName << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00173                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00174                 return false;
00175         }
00176 }
00177 
00178 template <class T>
00179 bool CArrayOS2D<T>::CopySubArray(const CArrayOS2D<T>& Source,double xmin,double ymin,double xmax,double ymax)
00180 {
00181         double Step=m_SubIndexing;
00182 //      double Step=GetSubIndexing();
00183         int ixmin=Source.GetNearestSubIndex(xmin)+Source.GetOrigo().GetX()*Step;
00184         int ixmax=Source.GetNearestSubIndex(xmax)+Source.GetOrigo().GetX()*Step;
00185         int iymin=Source.GetNearestSubIndex(ymin)+Source.GetOrigo().GetY()*Step;
00186         int iymax=Source.GetNearestSubIndex(ymax)+Source.GetOrigo().GetY()*Step;
00187         if ((xmin<xmax) && (ymin<ymax) && 
00188                 (ixmin>=0) && (ixmax<=(int)Source.GetWidthCells()-1) &&
00189                 (iymin>=0) && (iymax<=(int)Source.GetHeightCells()-1))
00190         {
00191                 // call base class method
00192                 bool ReturnValue=CArray2D<T>::CopySubArray(Source,ixmin,iymin,ixmax,iymax);
00193                 // setting subindexing
00194                 SetSubIndexing(Source.GetSubIndexing());
00195                 return ReturnValue;
00196         }
00197         else
00198         {
00199                 ostringstream ost;
00200                 ost << "CArrayOS2D<T>::CopySubArray() Illegal clipping rectangel" << IPLAddFileAndLine;
00201                 CError::ShowMessage(IPL_ERROR,ost.str().c_str());
00202                 return false;
00203         }
00204 }
00205 
00206 template <class T>
00207 bool CArrayOS2D<T>::CopySubArray(const CArrayOS2D<T>& Source,const CPoint2D<double>& UpperLeft,
00208                   const CPoint2D<double>& LowerRight)
00209 {
00210         return CopySubArray(Source, UpperLeft.GetX(),UpperLeft.GetY(),LowerRight.GetX(),
00211                                         LowerRight.GetY());
00212 }
